languages.text: "Некто совершил диверсию против когитатора логирования работ, чтобы затруднить нам поиск напарника убитого. Возможно, оный человек обладал ценной для следствия информацией".
"Someone sabotaged the work log cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner, who might have information valuable to the investigation."
languages.original_text: "Некто совершил диверсию против когитатора логирования работ, чтобы затруднить нам поиск напарника убитого. Возможно, оный человек обладал ценной для следствия информацией".

traits.locale_text: "Someone had sabotaged the task logging cogitator to make it difficult for us to find the victim's partner. This person may have had information of value to the investigation."
"Someone had sabotaged the task logging cogitator to make it difficult for us to find the victim's partner. This person may have had information of value to the investigation."
"Someone sabotaged the task-logging cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner. This person might have information valuable to the investigation."
"Someone sabotaged the task-logging cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner. This person might have information valuable to the investigation."
"Someone sabotaged the work log cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner, who might have information valuable to the investigation."
"Someone sabotaged the work log cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner, who might have information valuable to the investigation."
"Someone sabotaged the work log cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner, who might have information valuable to the investigation."

languages.text: "Jemand hat den Arbeitsprotokoll-Cogitator sabotiert, um uns die Suche nach dem Partner des Opfers zu erschweren, der möglicherweise über sachdienliche Informationen verfügen könnte."
languages.original_text: "Someone sabotaged the work log cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner, who might have information valuable to the investigation."

traits.locale_text: "Jemand hat den Arbeitsprotokoll-Cogitator sabotiert, um uns die Suche nach dem Partner des Opfers zu erschweren, der möglicherweise über sachdienliche Informationen verfügen könnte."

languages.text: « Quelqu'un a saboté le cogitateur des registres du personnel pour qu'il nous soit plus difficile de trouver le partenaire de la victime, le seul qui aurait pu avoir des informations précieuses pour l'enquête. »
languages.original_text: "Someone sabotaged the work log cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner, who might have information valuable to the investigation."

traits.locale_text: « Quelqu'un a saboté le cogitateur des registres du personnel pour qu'il nous soit plus difficile de trouver le partenaire de la victime, le seul qui aurait pu avoir des informations précieuses pour l'enquête. »

languages.text: «Alguien saboteó el cogitador de registros laborales para complicarnos la búsqueda del compañero de trabajo de la víctima, que podría tener información relevante para la investigación».
languages.original_text: "Someone sabotaged the work log cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner, who might have information valuable to the investigation."

traits.locale_text: «Alguien saboteó el cogitador de registros laborales para complicarnos la búsqueda del compañero de trabajo de la víctima, que podría tener información relevante para la investigación».

languages.text: 「誰かが作業ログコジテーターを破壊したため、操作において貴重な情報を持っている可能性のある被害者のパートナーを見つけることが難しくなりました」
languages.original_text: "Someone sabotaged the work log cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner, who might have information valuable to the investigation."

traits.locale_text: 「誰かが作業ログコジテーターを破壊したため、操作において貴重な情報を持っている可能性のある被害者のパートナーを見つけることが難しくなりました」

languages.text: “有人破坏了工作日志沉思者，因此我们很难找到受害者当时的工友。这位工友说不定能提供有价值的线索。”
languages.original_text: "Someone sabotaged the work log cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner, who might have information valuable to the investigation."

traits.locale_text: “有人破坏了工作日志沉思者，因此我们很难找到受害者当时的工友。这位工友说不定能提供有价值的线索。”

languages.text: "Birisi, kurbanın ortağını bulmamızı zorlaştırmak için çalışma kaydı kavramsayarını sabote etmiş. Kurbanın ortağı, soruşturmaya son derece katkı sağlayabilecek bilgilere sahip olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Someone sabotaged the work log cogitator so it would be harder for us to find the victim's partner, who might have information valuable to the investigation."
